entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:28 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 03:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -42.6°C
Wind: NW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 40 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 59 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
